§ 51305. Prohibited basis for appointment Preference may not be given to an individual for appointment as a cadet at the United States Merchant Marine Academy because one or more members of the individual’s immediate family are alumni of the Academy. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(b), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1572.)
